Text: How about NOT using imageshack? Whats so fuckin hard about it? Images never work unless you're here half an hour after its been uploaded.
connect with https.  all of them work fine.

To have no problem with imagehack:

Right click the link and select "open in new tab".

Then the image loads smoothly. :)

If you click right on the link, it appears that imagehack knows you come from thepiratebay and refuse to give you access to the link. By opening a new window, the problem is solved.

budy its not being in newtab/https
its abt getting a registration done lol
imageshack blocks TPB referrer's.  use https doesn't transfer referrer.  The images are all fine.  imageshack just doesn't like TPB.
